name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Content
1	Chapter 1 Introduction/ Chapter 2 Atoms, Molecules, and Ions
2	Chapter 3 Stoichiometry
3	Chapter 4 Types of Chemical Reactions and Solution Chemistry
4	Chapter 5 Gases
5	Chapter 5 Gases
6	Chapter 6 Chemical Equilibrium Exam I (Chapter 2-5)
7	Chapter 6 Chemical Equilibrium
8	Chapter 7 Acid and Base
9	Chapter 7 Acid and Base
10	Chapter 8 Applications of Aqueous Equilibria
11	Chapter 8 Applications of Aqueous Equilibria
12	Chapter 9 Energy, Enthalpy, and Thermochemistry Exam II (Chapter 6-8)
13	Chapter 9 Energy, Enthalpy, and Thermochemistry
14	Chapter 10 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free Energy
15	Chapter 10 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free Energy
16	Holiday
                   Chapter 10 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free Energy
17	Exam III (Chapter 9 to 11)
                   No Classes
18	No Classes
materials: Zumdahl, Steven S., Chemical Principles; Sixth Edition, Houghton Mifflin Company
